attributes.action: Stop the Savage cuts in the Civil Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to stop the wide ranging cuts in the Civil service before the most valuablue asset the staff Lose heart.

The Cuts are starting to affect morale in the Civil service and with the low rates of pay in many departments many civi; servant will leave which will cause a loss of experienced staff.

I ask the Prime minister to stop this now and have a reveiw on the affects the cuts are having on all departments
